wordGroup: cortical blindness 皮质性盲；皮质盲

sentences.en: It causes blindness or serious loss of vision.
sentences.cn: 这会引起失明或严重的视力衰退。

sentences.en: Blindness is a common complication of diabetes.
sentences.cn: 失明是糖尿病常有的一种并发症。

sentences.en: Early diagnosis and treatment can usually prevent blindness.
sentences.cn: 早期诊断和治疗通常可以防止失明。
